original_title: Bear Snores On & More Beary Adorable Tales
overview: BEAR SNORES ON & More Beary Adorable Tales (By Karma Wilson, Illustrated by Jane Chapman, Narrated by Karma Wilson) Forest animals stop by a cave to warm up from the snow. They drink tea and eat popcorn, but Bear just snores on. What will Bear do when he wakes up to a lair of noisy guests?
title: Bear Snores On & More Beary Adorable Tales
